observation_location.full: ERC, Clarkson Campus, Potsdam, New York

current_observation.observation_time: Last Updated on April 2, 1:34 PM EDT
current_observation.wind_string: From the WNW at 8.0 MPH Gusting to 12.0 MPH

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 50F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 27F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -3C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 14C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 36F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 2C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later at night. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later at night. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 44F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 7C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 35F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 2C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 4C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
